COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: It was just another boring old Saturday, spent in the
same old way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: It wasn't even ten o'clock yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e
STRING: It felt like kind of a waste of sleeping time to be waking
up at the same time I normally did on days that I would
go to school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164
STRING: Phorni and I were supposed to do an ensemble
tomorrow, but I also had plans to visit Ninna's house,
so it may have been a better idea to get the ensemble
out of the way today, instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184
STRING: Thinking about this, I looked around the room and
considered asking Phorni what she thought, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a
STRING: I had only just said good morning to her moments ago,
but it seemed that she had disappeared after seeing me
lazing about as I always did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0
STRING: She would probably reappear immediately if I called her
name, but there was no immediate need to do so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6
STRING: I thought about reading a book, but then changed my
mind and sat down at my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc
STRING: Pondering what I should play, the first thing that came
to mind was the song that Lise always sang.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2
STRING: It was hard to say that we had really done an ensemble,
as we had played together on opposite sides of a wall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208
STRING: She said that she wouldn't be there this week, either...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214
STRING: Thinking that there might be just the slightest
possibility, and that I would just be wasting time here
anyway, I decided to put my Fortelle in its case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a
STRING: I got ready to go out, and called out to Phorni when I
was at the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240
STRING: [Chris] “I'm going out for a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27c
STRING: [Phorni] “Shopping or something? See you later... Wait.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aa
STRING: Huh? Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c0
STRING: [Chris] “See you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d6
STRING: I headed out, leaving Phorni at home, who was looking
at me with a puzzled expression on her face after
seeing me with my uniform on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310
STRING: It was truly rare for me to go to school on a weekend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31c
STRING: All I was hoping for was that we could do a proper
ensemble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x332
STRING: She wasn't going to be here this week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33e
STRING: I hadn't forgotten what she had said, but I thought that
maybe she had only meant Monday to Friday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x354
STRING: And, if I couldn't see her today, so be it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x392
STRING: I listened carefully for a moment, wondering if I would
hear Lise's voice or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a8
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3be
STRING: I guess she's not here today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca
STRING: I had come all the way to school, but now I was
considering just going back home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e0
STRING: But... Perhaps I should go inside and practice a little,
first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: I was making excuses to myself, saying that I hadn't
come here just to see Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42c
STRING: Although it was intermittent, I could hear Lise's voice as
I walked down the hallway towards the music room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x474
STRING: Thinking that she must have just been taking a break
earlier, I hurried to the door of the music room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48a
STRING: But by the time I got there, she had stopped singing,
and the Old Wing was once again quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b6
STRING: [Lise] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cc
STRING: The door to the music room Lise was using was wide
open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d8
STRING: I had warned her that leaving the door open could be a
problem if someone else came here, but had she
forgotten?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51c
STRING: [Lise] “Guess he's not coming today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x532
STRING: Whispering this to herself, Lise seemed disinterested as
she played the piano.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x564
STRING: [Lise] “There's no reason why he would...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57a
STRING: The first time I had seen her here, she was having so
much fun singing that you could tell just at a glance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x590
STRING: But now, she seemed to be almost bored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59c
STRING: And the words she spoke, just now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a8
STRING: What did she mean by, “guess he's not coming?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d0
STRING: [Lise] “Hm, hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e6
STRING: And then, Lise, who was about to start singing, got up
from the piano and turned right around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x612
STRING: [Chris] “H-Hello...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x644
STRING: [Lise] “C-Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65a
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Sorry, I didn't mean to peek, but uh, the
door was open.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x696
STRING: [Lise] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ac
STRING: I was saying almost the exact same thing that I had said
that other time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b8
STRING: But unlike that time, Lise's expression was much harder
to read.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c4
STRING: Was she just being shy, or was it something else?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ec
STRING: [Lise] “B-But, why did you come here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x702
STRING: [Chris] “I thought I might get some practice in...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x734
STRING: [Lise] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74a
STRING: [Chris] “Are you here for practice too, Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77c
STRING: [Lise] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: [Chris] “I see... Well, have fun.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c4
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7da
STRING: I was planning on going over to the next music room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e6
STRING: But suddenly she looked troubled, and for some reason
I felt like asking her about an ensemble one last time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fc
STRING: The words that she whispered earlier, the door that was
wide open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x808
STRING: The way her facial expression changed when I tried to
leave just now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81e
STRING: Interpreting these signs in a somewhat self-serving way,
I decided it would be okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x834
STRING: [Chris] “So, uh... I was thinking that if you were
interested... We could do an ensemble?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87e
STRING: [Chris] “That song you sing... I don't know the name of
it, but I've kind of taken a liking to it. And I was thinking
I'd like to practice to some vocals today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8be
STRING: [Chris] “But, uh, it's not a problem if you don't want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f0
STRING: [Lise] “U-Umm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x906
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x924
STRING: [Lise] “You don't mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93a
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x96c
STRING: [Lise] “You... Don't mind if I sing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x982
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b4
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... I mean...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e2
STRING: Wouldn't you prefer to play with
someone else?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f8
STRING: [Chris] “It's not really a matter of minding... I was
thinking that I'd like to rehearse with you, Lise...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa34
STRING: [Lise] “R-Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa74
STRING: For a short time after that, Lise averted her gaze, and
then panicked because she realized she did so, and
went through a whole range of facial expressions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8a
STRING: I had no idea what she was being so hesitant about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa96
STRING: But I had started to get my expectations up, thinking
that she was going to say yes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab4
STRING: [Lise] “U-Umm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: [Chris] “Yes...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafc
STRING: [Lise] “Could we rehearse... Together?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb12
STRING: [Chris] “Of course! I'm glad you want to, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb44
STRING: [Lise] “O-Okay, thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5a
STRING: Lise bowed politely and then made a troubled face as if
she wasn't sure what to do next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb84
STRING: [Chris] “What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9a
STRING: I looked at her while I was unpacking my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbae
STRING: [Lise] “Umm... So, what should I do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc4
STRING: [Chris] “Well, you just have to sing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf6
STRING: [Lise] “Ah, no, I mean... Right now, is there something I
should prepare?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0c
STRING: [Chris] “You don't have a score, right? If that's the case,
just give me a little bit longer. I'll be ready soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc48
STRING: [Lise] “Oh, I see. Um, you don't need to rush.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5e
STRING: [Chris] “It's okay, I'm already done. So, what do you
want to do? Shall we just rehearse, or do you need to
warm up first?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9a
STRING: [Lise] “Ah, I've already finished warming up, so... Uh...
Let's try rehearsing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: [Chris] “Alright! So, let's just go from the top.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd8
STRING: [Lise] “O-Okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd30
STRING: Even though the song was over, Lise kept her eyes
closed until the final sound of my Fortelle had
disappeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd46
STRING: She almost looked as if she was deep in meditation, and
when she opened her eyes, she look completely
refreshed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd80
STRING: [Lise] “Um... That was really good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd96
STRING: [Chris] “You too, good job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdac
STRING: Before we knew it, a few hours had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb8
STRING: During that time, we didn't take a single break as we
did our ensemble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc4
STRING: The day was still young, but I already felt the need to
rotate my shoulders and stretch out the tension.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf6
STRING: [Lise] “Uh, Chris...”
[Chris] “Lise...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe2a
STRING: We both spoke at almost the exact same time, but
backing off, Lise let me go first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe40
STRING: [Chris] “I was just wondering about... How long you
were going to be here today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe68
STRING: [Lise] “Oh... I, uh... Was going to ask about the same
thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7e
STRING: [Chris] “R-Really? Well, I was planning on practicing until
late afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9c
STRING: [Lise] “Oh... I see. I was thinking about practicing until
about that time, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb2
STRING: [Chris] “In that case... Shall we keep going?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee4
STRING: [Lise] “Uh... Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf08
STRING: I felt that my Fortelle and the sound of her voice went
surprisingly well together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1e
STRING: It was something I just kind of sensed, it was hard to
explain why or how.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf34
STRING: It may have just been because I was enjoying our
ensemble, but perhaps it was something deeper than
that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4a
STRING: Either way, it was a lot more fun than performing in
different rooms with a wall between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf60
STRING: And to be honest, being able to see her face when she
sang was a big part of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6c
STRING: Lise looked happy singing, just like she did the first time
I saw her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf78
STRING: [Chris] “Alright... How about we...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8e
STRING: The moment I started speaking, I noticed that my
stomach was empty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9a
STRING: As usual, I had skipped breakfast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa6
STRING: [Chris] “Actually, before that... Aren't you hungry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd8
STRING: [Lise] “N-No... But, are you getting hungry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfee
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, a bit. I always skip breakfast. You don't
eat lunch?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102a
STRING: [Lise] “Hmm... Not really, I suppose.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1040
STRING: [Chris] “I wonder if that's because you eat breakfast
properly...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1072
STRING: [Lise] “Uh, no, I don't eat breakfast much, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1088
STRING: [Chris] “In that case... You eat a lot for dinner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a6
STRING: [Lise] “My dinners... Are pretty normal, I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10bc
STRING: [Chris] “You just... Don't eat much at all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ee
STRING: [Lise] “Not really, no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1104
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... I'm not really a big eater, but I guess I get
hungry around normal meal times.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: [Lise] “Oh, don't mind me, feel free to eat something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1156
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I'm only going to grab something at the
cafeteria. Why don't you come too?”
[Chris] “If you don't eat anything from now until
late afternoon, you're going to run out of energy
later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119c
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... I'm fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b2
STRING: And in an instant, she was making a troubled face
again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11be
STRING: It seemed like the word “cafeteria” is what caused it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ca
STRING: [Chris] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e0
STRING: I think I remember her saying something about not
liking crowded places when we first met.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ec
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, why don't I get you something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121e
STRING: [Lise] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: [Chris] “I won't be too long. I'm pretty sure they sell
bread rolls and that kind of thing in the cafeteria.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125c
STRING: [Lise] “B-But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: [Chris] “Don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1288
STRING: I left Lise, who seemed slightly bothered, and went back
to the Second Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f6
STRING: The school cafeteria was open on Saturdays and
Sundays, just like any other time of the week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1302
STRING: Which showed just how many students came to school
to practice, regardless of whether they had classes or
not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1318
STRING: Of course, it was the first time I had used the cafeteria
on a day like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1324
STRING: I asked the lady working in the cafeteria about the
bread rolls, but it seemed that they didn't sell them on
weekends.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133a
STRING: I hadn't actually bought any before, but there was
usually baked bread filled with all kinds of things on
sale near the entrance to the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135c
STRING: I guess they were there to be bought and eaten al
fresco at home, which there probably wasn't much need
for on a weekend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138c
STRING: [Chris] “Hrm... What to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13aa
STRING: I decided to not even consider bringing Lise here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c2
STRING: I wonder if I could bring her something as long as I
promised to return the plate?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d8
STRING: I usually didn't bother with the menu, but now I was
looking at it, wondering what I should get for Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f0
STRING: Just then, a voice called out to me from the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fc
STRING: It was the lady who worked the cash register in the
cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140a
STRING: Hers was a familiar face... In fact, since I'd been coming
to the cafeteria for three years now, her face was much
more familiar than that of the other third year Fortelle
course students that I never saw anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1456
STRING: [canteen aunt] “What can I get you, today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146c
STRING: [Chris] “Actually... I was thinking of eating al fresco,
but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: [canteen aunt] “It's a rare thing to see you here on a
weekend. Wait right there for a moment, would you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b4
STRING: [Chris] “Uh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ca
STRING: Not waiting for me to answer, she went off into the
kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e0
STRING: When she came back, she was carrying a basket that
had something in it, and handed it to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f6
STRING: [Chris] “T-This is?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1514
STRING: [canteen aunt] “My lunch. You've been coming here
regularly for such a long time, so don't worry about the
money. Just bring the basket back when you're done.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153e
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... But, I couldn't possibly do that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x155c
STRING: [canteen aunt] “It's fine. You're really working hard,
coming in on a weekend and practicing like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1572
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1590
STRING: [canteen aunt] “Sorry if I got your hopes up, but my
lunch isn't really that special. C'mon now, the line
behind you is getting longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b0
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c6
STRING: Apologizing, I looked behind me, but the students
standing there were only looking at the menu board.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15dc
STRING: [Chris] “Um...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f2
STRING: I wanted to say something, but the lady had already
returned to the kitchen, and didn't give me a chance to
say anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1608
STRING: There was a bell on the counter near the cash register,
which I suppose I could have used to call her back,
but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161e
STRING: I decided it was best to simply accept her kindness, and
thank her properly afterwards.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1634
STRING: Worried that it was only a meal for one woman...
I took a look inside the basket, however I found that
the amount of food was befitting someone of her size,
and that it would be enough for both Lise and me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1686
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry to keep you waiting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c0
STRING: [Lise] “Oh... Welcome back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d6
STRING: Not wasting a moment, I moved the chair from in front
of my Fortelle to the table, and got ready to eat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ec
STRING: I offered some to Lise, who was looking on from a slight
distance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f8
STRING: [Chris] “There's a lot here, so why don't you have some
too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172a
STRING: [Lise] “Ah, I'm fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1740
STRING: [Chris] “You didn't eat breakfast, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1772
STRING: [Lise] “That's right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1788
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, you should at least eat something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179e
STRING: I was now saying the exact thing people had often said
to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b4
STRING: It was so ironic that I couldn't help but laugh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17dc
STRING: [Lise] “W-What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, nothing, it's just funny because usually I'm
the one being told to eat properly. But even then, I
never skip two meals in a row.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182e
STRING: [Lise] “Oh, is that so...? Um... In that case, I'll have just a
little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: [Chris] “Good. There's too much as it is, so I was
wondering how I was going to eat it all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1864
STRING: I opened the basket and showed it to Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1870
STRING: Inside were just some ordinary bread rolls, stuffed with
tomato and cheese.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1886
STRING: And what I told Lise just now was no exaggeration,
there really was a lot of food inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b8
STRING: [Lise] “Oh my, did you buy all of this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ce
STRING: [Chris] “Well, actually...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e4
STRING: I quickly explained what had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190c
STRING: [Lise] “Oh... I see. How lucky!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1922
STRING: Lise looked at me with what almost seemed to be a hint
of envy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1938
STRING: [Chris] “Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196a
STRING: [Lise] “No, I... Was just thinking, they must be fond of
you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1980
STRING: [Chris] “I think it was just because I had never come to
school on a weekend before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19bc
STRING: [Lise] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d2
STRING: [Chris] “A-Anyway, let's eat lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e8
STRING: I think I would have been too embarrassed to answer if
she had asked me why.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fe
STRING: I just wanted to do an ensemble with Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0a
STRING: It was of course what I honestly felt, but it would have
been embarrassing to actually go and say it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a20
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, why don't you sit here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a36
STRING: When I pointed towards the seat near my Fortelle that I
had moved for Lise, she shook her head hesitantly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a68
STRING: [Lise] “Uh... Um, I'm fine here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a7e
STRING: So that the noise wouldn't travel too far, I was sitting
just a little bit away from the piano that Lise was
originally seated at.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a94
STRING: It was just the right distance for when she was
singing... But for eating a meal, it was a little awkward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aaa
STRING: [Chris] “You sure? Well... If you say so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac0
STRING: I answered indifferently for the time being, and then
took out one of the bread rolls and offered it to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1acc
STRING: Upon taking it, Lise hurried back to the piano; perched
herself on the seat; and began eating.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1a
STRING: Looking at her from where I was, I could see that she
really had a delicate frame.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b30
STRING: I thought it was just a normal bread roll when I held it,
but in her hands it looked quite big.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b46
STRING: Lise was silent the entire time, and she seemed to be
eating with all her might, which made her seem like
some kind of small animal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b5c
STRING: Noticing my gaze on her as I thought less than flattering
things about her, she looked at me with upturned eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8a
STRING: [Lise] “U-Um... Is something the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba0
STRING: [Chris] “No... I was just wondering if you liked it or not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bbe
STRING: [Lise] “I-It's delicious. And very nostalgic.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd4
STRING: [Chris] “Nostalgic?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf2
STRING: [Lise] “Uh, I mean, a long time ago I ate this a lot, but...
Not much anymore.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c12
STRING: [Chris] “I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c28
STRING: The combination of tomato and cheese was quite
typical here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c3e
STRING: As it only needed to be put between bread or in a
bread roll, it was more so a popular go-to choice for
breakfasts or lunches.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5e
STRING: But I guess I could understand how it may have been
nostalgic for Lise, as she didn't really eat breakfast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c74
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, I'm glad you like it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c92
STRING: [Lise] “Yes... Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb8
STRING: Answering only with this, Lise returned to putting
everything into eating her bread roll.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc4
STRING: Because her mouth was small, the amount she ate in
one bite was also quite small.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cda
STRING: Even so, she finally finished her first bread roll around
the time I had finished eating my second.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d08
STRING: [Chris] “Would you like another one?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d3a
STRING: [Lise] “Uh...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d74
STRING: [Chris] “We still have three left... Which is a few too
many for me to eat on my own. I was kind of hoping to
return the basket without anything left over...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d94
STRING: I hadn't forgotten about leaving some for the lady in the
cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da0
STRING: But I doubted we would leave an amount that would be
enough for her, so I figured that she would be much
happier if we just ate all of them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ddc
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... I see. In that case, one more please.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df2
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e08
STRING: Responding in this way, I tilted the basket in Lise's
direction, and she scuffled over and took another bread
roll, then returned to where she had been sitting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e52
STRING: And then, she began eating again as if she was in a
trance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e5e
STRING: Starting on my third bread roll, I continued gazing at
Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6c
STRING: I had considered that she might not have wanted to sit
next to me, but perhaps the distance we had at the
moment suited us best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8c
STRING: It wasn't as if we had become close enough yet for me
to consider partnering up with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea4
STRING: I didn't have to worry that much about Fal, who was
also a third year, as she had her own things to take care
of.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eba
STRING: But Lise was still a first year, and she didn't have so
much to gain by pairing up with me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed0
STRING: And furthermore... I was enjoying my ensembles with
Lise, which was enough for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f06
STRING: No matter how much she ate, it seemed as if the bread
roll she was holding wasn't getting any smaller.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f34
STRING: [Lise] “W-What's wrong...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f4a
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing at all, sorry. Don't mind me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f68
STRING: [Lise] “Uh... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9e
STRING: Sitting in her strangely distant spot, Lise continued
nibbling on her bread roll.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fac
STRING: There was something about her...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fb8
STRING: It was probably a rude thing to think, but... She kind of
looked like a small animal that was feeding.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fce
STRING: She was almost like a cat watching me from afar, which
would run away if I got too close...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe6
STRING: There was just something cute about her, and I gazed
at her, oblivious to how much time had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2038
STRING: [Lise] “Um... Thank you very much for lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204e
STRING: [Chris] “You're welcome.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2064
STRING: I guess she ate a lot, considering how light her frame
was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208c
STRING: [Lise] “I'm so full...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20a2
STRING: [Chris] “Good. You have to eat a lot, you're too skinny
as it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c2
STRING: It was true that her cheeks were soft and round in a
feminine way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ce
STRING: But the parts of her that weren't covered by her uniform,
such as her neck or wrists, were surprisingly skinny.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2100
STRING: [Lise] “Am I... too skinny?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2116
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x212c
STRING: Lise looked down as if to check her own body, and then
said something in a whisper.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x215e
STRING: [Lise] “Do you prefer girls who... aren't skinny?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x217e
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21b0
STRING: [Lise] “I-It's nothing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c6
STRING: Nervously acting like it was nothing, Lise covered her
body with both her arms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21dc
STRING: If she hadn't done that... I might not have understood,
but now I could see what she was getting at.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f2
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't mean...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2224
STRING: [Lise] “N-No, It's... Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x223a
STRING: I guess... The fact we could even have a conversation
like this meant that we had become a little closer?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a0
STRING: [Lise] “Um... That was really good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22b6
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, good job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22cc
STRING: After eating our lunch, we did another ensemble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22d8
STRING: We had gotten much more used to playing together,
and I felt we were starting to get pretty good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ee
STRING: [Chris] “Considering how many ensembles we've done, I
guess it's safe to say we're getting better.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x232a
STRING: [Lise] “Yes... Ah, I mean no, I think it's because you play
the Fortelle so well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x234a
STRING: As always, Lise didn't seem to have any confidence in
her singing ability.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2360
STRING: I think the way she nodded immediately in the
beginning reflected her actual feelings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x236c
STRING: But, if she denies it herself, then it doesn't really mean
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2382
STRING: [Chris] “No, no, that's not true. You could sing on stage
if you wanted to!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23be
STRING: [Lise] “No... Never.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d4
STRING: She wasn't being humble... The look that crept onto her
face was more like one of fear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ea
STRING: She mentioned that she didn't like crowded places.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23f6
STRING: Did that have something to do with it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2402
STRING: [Chris] “W-Well... Anyway, I just think you should be a
little more confident in yourself, Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x244c
STRING: [Chris] “So, shall we get going? I doubt any of the
teachers would come by here on their rounds, but it'll
be a pain if the school gates are closed on us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2492
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... S-Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a8
STRING: I avoided any more topics that would make her
uncomfortable, and spoke cheerfully on purpose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24be
STRING: I wasn't aware of the reason, but I was now positive
that Lise had no confidence in her singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24d4
STRING: That was probably why she was practicing by herself in
a place like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e0
STRING: Perhaps she disliked crowded places because she didn't
want anyone to hear her sing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f6
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I'm ready now, shall we go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2514
STRING: [Lise] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252a
STRING: Lise didn't have anything to pack up, so after I put my
Fortelle in its case and stood up, we both headed out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x257c
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, I'm going to go return this...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ae
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25c4
STRING: I couldn't ask her if she wanted to come with me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25d0
STRING: We had already spent a lot of time together today, and
more so than that, I doubted that Lise was comfortable
enough around me to be okay with walking home
together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25f0
STRING: We were only friends as far as practicing together in the
Old Wing was concerned, and even today was only the
first time we had done a proper ensemble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2610
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, see you next time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2642
STRING: [Lise] “Y-Yes. If you'll excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2666
STRING: Polite as ever, Lise scampered from the school grounds.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2672
STRING: She turned around just one time, and bowed politely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x267e
STRING: When I waved my hand in response, she smiled back to
me, which was quite the rarity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c6
STRING: I went and returned the basket, and upon taking it from
me, the cafeteria lady smiled happily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e4
STRING: [canteen aunt] “You ate the whole lot. I'm glad I went to
the effort of preparing them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26fa
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you very much. I wanted to leave some
for you, but they tasted so good and...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2722
STRING: [canteen aunt] “You're a growing young man, I wouldn't
have it any other way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2738
STRING: She laughed heartily and headed back into the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2744
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x275a
STRING: She probably hadn't heard it, but I thanked her again
and then headed home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27aa
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e4
STRING: [Phorni] “Welcome back!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27fa
STRING: Despite the fact it was a weekend, Phorni had placed a
towel just inside the doorway for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2806
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for the towel.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x281c
STRING: Saying this, I dried my hair before going any further.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2844
STRING: [Phorni] “You're home late. And you're in your school
uniform.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x287c
STRING: Could it be, you went to school?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2888
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. I wanted to get some practice in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a6
STRING: [Phorni] “That's kinda rare for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28bc
STRING: [Chris] “I guess it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28da
STRING: [Phorni] “But, who did you practice with?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28f0
STRING: [Chris] “Hm...? With Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2922
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh... You two practiced a couple of times last
week, right? I didn't think you'd make plans to practice
on a weekend, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2942
STRING: [Chris] “We didn't actually make a plan, as such...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2978
STRING: I told Phorni about everything that happened today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2984
STRING: How we did some ensembles, and how we ate the
bread rolls together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x299a
STRING: Phorni laughed, saying that we didn't suit each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a6
STRING: I was fully aware of that myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29b2
STRING: But for some reason, I couldn't just leave her be.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29be
STRING: Deep down in my heart, I felt she kind of resembled
Arie.
